name: Restraint
description:
You find yourself alone within the vault of an underground  maze like facility in the aftermath of a containment failure and with your oxygen running low you decided to take the risk and leave your shelter in hope of escape via the facilities main elevator but who knows what may still be lurking around the facility... 

This Game Is Designed To Be Very Hard, It Requires Good Navigational Skills And Memory In Order To Beat

It Is Also Possible To Beat The Game Without Meeting The Monster

Controls

WASD-Movement

Control Toggle-Crouch

F-Toggle Flashlight

Shift-Sprint

Touch Keycard To Collect Them

Keycards-Green ,Yellow, Blue, Purple ,Red, Orange
